description: The dendrometer created at the OPEnS Lab - tailored for grapevines - alleviates key failure points in other designs by using zero-thermal expansion carbon fiber, spring tension, and a linear magnetic encoder.
title: High Precision, Low-Cost Dendrometer for Evaluating Water Stress Using Magnetic Sensing of Diurnal Stem Fluctuations of Grapevines
